text:
@nytimes The White House is devoid of human feelings. They unequivocally don't care.
145,000 Americans are dead. over Over 4 million are infected with COVID19. No one cares about the garden. Or the tennis gazebo. We care about dying unnecessarily.

domain.name: Political Body
domain.description: A section of a government, like The Supreme Court

entity.name: The White House
